channel.title: Object spawning help
channel.description:
I need help spawning objects... I've seen this topic: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,14477.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,14477.0.html[/url]
I'm using Project 16 so I have an objects.cfg file. How do I use this?
objects.cfg: [code] //Face: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west //Type: 1 = Y + 1 | 2 = X + 1 | 3 = Y - 1 | 4 = X - 1 //----------objID----------objX--------objY----height-------face--------type---------open? object = 1536 3215 3225 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1536 3215 3211 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1530 3208 3211 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1536 3207 3217 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1530 3226 3214 0 -3 2 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1530 3226 3223 0 -3 2 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1530 3207 3210 1 -3 2 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1536 3207 3214 1 -3 2 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1536 3207 3222 1 -3 2 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1530 3207 3227 1 -3 2 false Lumbridge Castle object = 1533 3238 3210 0 -3 4 false Lumbridge object = 1530 3234 3207 0 -1 2 false Lumbridge object = 1531 3233 3203 0 -1 2 true Lumbridge object = 1530 3235 3198 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge object = 1530 3247 3193 0 -1 4 false Lumbridge object = 1530 3230 3235 0 -2 1 false Lumbridge object = 1530 3228 3240 0 -3 2 false Lumbridge
//Admin House //I would put objects here to build an admin house [ENDOFOBJECTLIST]
[/code] The stuff above the Admin House comment was already their.
What is type? Maybe the side you use it from?
Another Question... If their is a black square, ex x=1000 y=1000, could you make land there?

item.title: Object spawning help
item.dc:creator: @gikid gikid
item.description:
@gikid wrote:

I need help spawning objects… I’ve seen this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,14477.0.html

I’m using Project 16 so I have an objects.cfg file. How do I use this?

objects.cfg:

//Face: -3 = south | -2 = east | -1 = north | 0 = west
//Type: 1 = Y + 1 | 2 = X + 1 | 3 = Y - 1 | 4 = X - 1
//----------objID----------objX--------objY----height-------face--------type---------open?
object = 1536 	3215 	3225 	0 	-2 	1 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1536 	3215 	3211 	0 	-2 	1 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1530 	3208 	3211 	0 	-2 	1 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1536 	3207 	3217 	0 	-2 	1 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1530 	3226 	3214 	0 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1530 	3226 	3223 	0 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1530 	3207 	3210 	1 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1536 	3207 	3214 	1 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1536 	3207 	3222 	1 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1530 	3207 	3227 	1 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge Castle
object = 1533 	3238 	3210 	0 	-3 	4 	false 		Lumbridge
object = 1530 	3234 	3207 	0 	-1 	2 	false 		Lumbridge
object = 1531 	3233 	3203 	0 	-1 	2 	true 		Lumbridge
object = 1530 	3235 	3198 	0 	-2 	1 	false 		Lumbridge
object = 1530 	3247 	3193 	0 	-1 	4 	false 		Lumbridge
object = 1530 	3230 	3235 	0 	-2 	1 	false 		Lumbridge
object = 1530 	3228 	3240 	0 	-3 	2 	false 		Lumbridge

//Admin House
//I would put objects here to build an admin house
[ENDOFOBJECTLIST]

The stuff above the Admin House comment was already their.

What is type? Maybe the side you use it from?

Another Question…
If their is a black square, ex x=1000 y=1000, could you make land there?

Read full topic
